branch.description: The branch that this project should be monitoring

owner.description: Set to `null` to remove all ownership. User must be a member of the same organization as the project.

id.description: A user to assign as the project owner.

$ul: **attributes**: Applied project attributes
**criticality**
**environment**
**lifecycle**
**branch**: The monitored branch (if available)
**browseUrl**: URL with project overview
**created**: The date that the project was created on
**hostname**: The hostname for a CLI project, null if not set
**id**: The project identifier
**imageBaseImage**: For docker projects shows the base image
**imageCluster**: For Kubernetes projects shows the origin cluster name
**imageId**: For docker projects shows the ID of the image
**imagePlatform**: For docker projects shows the platform of the image
**imageTag**: For docker projects shows the tag of the image
**importingUser**: The user who imported the project
**email**: The email of the user.
**id**: The ID of the user.
**name**: The name of the user.
**username**: The username of the user.
**isMonitored**: Describes if a project is currently monitored or it is de-activated
**issueCountsBySeverity**: Number of known vulnerabilities in the project, not including ignored issues
**critical**: Number of critical severity vulnerabilities
**high**: Number of high severity vulnerabilities
**low**: Number of low severity vulnerabilities
**medium**: Number of medium severity vulnerabilities
**lastTestedDate**: The date on which the most recent test was conducted for this project
**name**
**origin**: The origin the project was added from
**owner**: The user who owns the project, null if not set
**readOnly**: Whether the project is read-only
**remediation**: Remediation data (if available)
**patch**: Recommended patches to apply to the project
**pin**: Recommended pins to apply to the project (Python only)
**upgrade**: Recommended upgrades to apply to the project
**remoteRepoUrl**: The project remote repository url. Only set for projects imported via the Snyk CLI tool.
**tags**: List of applied tags
**targetReference**: The identifier for which revision of the resource is scanned by Snyk. For example this may be a branch for SCM project, or a tag for a container image
**testFrequency**: The frequency of automated Snyk re-test. Can be 'daily', 'weekly or 'never'
**totalDependencies**: Number of dependencies of the project
**type**: The package manager of the project
